Comments_List: Everything I know about welding comes from Dave via this course.

I gained practical welding and machining skills I think will be incredibly useful in the future for everything from prototyping engineering designs and building laboratory equipment to fixing up around the home.

I really liked the hands-off approach of the course - showing and explaining how it should be done then trusting that I'll figure it out.  This reduced the pressure and allowed me to figure things out myself, which I actually think ended up speeding the learning curve.
If you want to know how to weld you must take this class!
Absolutely.  Even for an undergraduate, where you won't earn any credit, just getting familiar with the shop and learning practical skills is useful for any engineer/scientist.  Also Dave is awesome!
